# CheckRole
Easy Role Check

# How To Use

```javascript
let CheckRole = require('CheckRole');

// Can someone Interact With Bulletin Board For Complaining From Soft-Blocked User
var cr =
    CheckRole('+owner -hard_blocked +operator +soft_blocked -user -_all');

var hard_blocked_user = ['hard_blocked', 'user'];
cr.Pass(hard_blocked_user) // false

var soft_blocked_user = ['soft_blocked', 'user'];
cr.Pass(soft_blocked_user) // true

var common_user       = ['user'];
cr.Pass(common_user) // false

var operator          = ['operator', 'user'];
cr.Pass(operator) // true

var blocked_operator  = ['hard_blocked', 'operator', 'user'];
cr.Pass(blocked_operator) // false

var owner             = ['owner', 'user'];
cr.Pass(owner);

var blocked_owner     = ['hard_blocked', 'owner', 'user'];
// Owner might be blocked because of vulnerability
cr.Pass(blocked_owner);
```
